alert.note: Alert for Greeley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued May 09 at 8:46PM CDT until May 10 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 041... * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 041 Greeley. * Winds...On Tuesday, expect southeasterly to southerly winds at 15 to 25 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 to 20 percent. * Impacts...Extreme and unpredictable fire behavior. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.
info.instruction: Outdoor burning is not advised on Tuesday. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.
